steps: Boil salted water and cook spaghetti until al dente.
Whisk eggs and grated pecorino in a bowl.
Drain pasta, reserve some water, and mix with pancetta.
Add egg mixture off heat, stirring quickly to create a creamy sauce.
Season with black pepper and serve.
Cook fettuccine in boiling salted water until al dente.
Melt butter in a pan, add cream, and simmer.
Stir in grated parmesan until smooth.
Season with salt and a pinch of nutmeg.
Toss pasta in sauce and serve hot.
Saut√© onion and garlic until soft.
Add curry powder and cook for 1 minute.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Pour in coconut milk, simmer for 20 minutes.
Season with salt, garnish with cilantro, and serve.
